```{r setup}
library(KhelpeR)
library(data.table)
library(mlbench)
library(magrittr)
```


```{r}
data("PimaIndiansDiabetes2")
dataset <- data.table::as.data.table(PimaIndiansDiabetes2)
```

# Continuous Statistics 

## Simple Continuous Statistics, including normality

```{r}
KhelpeR::continuous_stats_table1(dataset) %>%
  KhelpeR::html_table()
```

## Visual inspection of selected variables 

```{r}
KhelpeR::plot_normality(
  dataset = dataset,
  variable = "pregnant"
)
```

```{r}
KhelpeR::plot_normality(
  dataset = dataset,
  variable = "pregnant",
  group_var = "diabetes"
)
```
